text: “Mowa wa Modimo o mo go nna. O ntaoletse go rerela bahumanegi Mafoko a a Molemo; o nthometse go fodisa dipelo tse di phatlogileng le go bolela gore magolegwa a tla gololwa, le difofu di tlaa bona, bapatikegi ba tlaa gololwa mo bagateleding ba bone le gore Modimo o ipaakanyeditse go naya letlhogonolo botlhe ba ba tlang mo go one.”
